title: AIIMS Gorakhpur Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 55 Senior Resident Posts
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences Gorakhpur (AIIMS Gorakhpur) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 55 Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post Graduation, MD/ MS, can grab this chance and apply for the AIIMS Gorakhpur Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply ...
